citations.narrative:
The licensee has started the contingency plan, but has not completed it. It doesn't detail the various types of emergencies
that could happen along with what the action plan would be in those types of situations. Not having an up-to-date
contingency plan doesn't ensure the licensee will be prepared should an emergency or disaster happen. The licensee
must complete the contingency plan in accordance with the requirements outlined in the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by
4/28/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
The licensee has started the contingency plan, but has not completed it. It doesn't detail the various types of emergencies 
that could happen along with what the action plan would be in those types of situations. Not having an up-to-date 
contingency plan doesn't ensure the licensee will be prepared should an emergency or disaster happen. The licensee 
must complete the contingency plan in accordance with the requirements outlined in the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by 
4/28/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
